text: Little Einsteins: Our Huge Adventure is a 2005 American animated musical adventure movie. It was released on August 23, 2005, by Walt Disney Home Entertainment for Playhouse Disney. It was followed by a television series Little Einsteins from 2005 to 2009. The Little Einsteins (Leo, June, Quincy and Annie) find a caterpillar. They helped him after he falls off a little green pickup truck to get to a tree of many colors to become a butterfly. == Other websites == * * * Category:2005 animated movies Category:2005 adventure movies Category:2005 fantasy movies Category:2005 musical movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:2000s American adventure movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American musical movies
title: Our Huge Adventure
